request.description:
## List subject objects

`GET /v1/subjects`

GET Parameters:
* **filters** (array), optional - One or more filters
* **sorts** (array), optional - One or more sorting parameters
* **limit** (integer), optional - Limit on the result set
* **offset** (integer), optional - Offset on the result set
* **count** (boolean), optional - If set to true Response:X-Results-Total header will show total count in result set (regardless of any limit and offset set)

Filter Types:
* **subject.id**
* **subject.name**
* **subject.description**
* **subject.createdAt**
* **subject.updatedAt**
* **subject.deletedAt**

Sort Types:
* **subject.id**
* **subject.name**
* **subject.description**
* **subject.createdAt**
* **subject.updatedAt**
* **subject.deletedAt**

### Request:
`GET /v1/subjects`

### Response - 200 OK:
X-Results-Total 2
```
[
    {
        "id": 7,
        "name": "bar",
        "description": "Bar entity",
        "createdAt": {
            "date": "2019-04-05 09:20:07.000000",
            "timezone_type": 3,
            "timezone": "UTC"
        },
        "updatedAt": {
            "date": "2019-04-05 09:27:33.000000",
            "timezone_type": 3,
            "timezone": "UTC"
        },
        "deletedAt": null
    },
    {
        "id": 8,
        "name": "foo",
        "description": "Foo Entity",
        "createdAt": {
            "date": "2019-04-05 09:28:07.000000",
            "timezone_type": 3,
            "timezone": "UTC"
        },
        "updatedAt": null,
        "deletedAt": null
    }
]
```

### Error Response Codes

`400 - Bad Request`
```
{
    "message": "value for index 0, part 2 (field) must be one of (subject.id, subject.name, subject.description, subject.createdAt, subject.updatedAt, subject.deletedAt)",
    "code": 4000101
}
```

## Create a new subject in a collection

`POST /v1/subjects`

POST Parameters:
* **name** (string), required, unique, max 128 - Subject name
* **description** (string), required, max 256 - Description of the subject

### Request:
`POST /v1/subjects`

```
{
	"name": "foo",
	"description": "Foo Entity"
}
```

### Response - 201 Created:
```
{
    "id": 7,
    "name": "foo",
    "description": "Foo Entity",
    "createdAt": {
        "date": "2019-04-05 09:20:07.482862",
        "timezone_type": 3,
        "timezone": "UTC"
    },
    "updatedAt": null,
    "deletedAt": null
}
```

### Error Response Codes

`400 - Bad request`
```
{
    "message": "Required parameter "name" missing",
    "code": 0
}
```

`409 - Conflict`
```
{
    "message": "Subject with name foo already exists",
    "code": 4090001
}
```

## Reads subject details

`GET /v1/subjects/:spec`

Segment Parameters:
* **spec** (string | int) - Subject id or name

### Request:
`GET /v1/subjects/7` | `GET /v1/subjects/foo`

### Response - 200 OK:
```
{
    "id": 7,
    "name": "foo",
    "description": "Foo Entity",
    "createdAt": {
        "date": "2019-04-05 09:20:07.000000",
        "timezone_type": 3,
        "timezone": "UTC"
    },
    "updatedAt": null,
    "deletedAt": null
}
```

### Error Response Codes

`404 - Not Found`
```
{
    "message": "Subject not found",
    "code": 0
}
```

Segment Parameters:

POST Parameters:
* **name** (string) - Subject name
* **description** (string) - Subject descriptin

### Request:

```
{
	"name": "bar",
	"description": "Bar entity"
}
```

### Response - 200 OK:
```
{
    "id": 7,
    "name": "bar",
    "description": "Bar entity",
    "createdAt": {
        "date": "2019-04-05 09:20:07.000000",
        "timezone_type": 3,
        "timezone": "UTC"
    },
    "updatedAt": {
        "date": "2019-04-05 09:27:33.259172",
        "timezone_type": 3,
        "timezone": "UTC"
    },
    "deletedAt": null

```

### Error Response Codes

`404 - Not Found`
```

    "message": "Subject not found",
    "code": 0

```

`DELETE /v1/subjects/:spec`

Segment Parameters:
* **spec** (string | id) - Subject id

### Request:
`DELETE /v1/subjects/7` | `DELETE /v1/subjects/foo`

POST Parameters:

## Delete subject permission from Collection

`DELETE /v1/subject-permissions/:spec`

Segment Parameters:
* **spec** (string | id) - SubjectPermission id or spec

### Request:
`DELETE /v1/subject-permissions/11` | `DELETE /v1/subject-permissions/foo_view`

### Response - 200 OK:
```

}
```

### Error Response Codes

`404 - Not Found`
```
{
    "message": "SubjectPermission not found",
    "code": 0
}
```

## Add SubjectPermission to a collection

This route is idempotent and only confirms the status of the operation. For example it can be called multiple times with the same details and and will return the same response as long as the given SubjectPermission exists in the collection (regardles if it existed in the collection prior to the operation).

`PUT /v1/permission-groups/:permission-group/subject-permissions`

POST Parameters:
* **subjectPermission** (string), required - SubjectPermission id to add to collection

### Request:
`PUT /v1/permission-groups/:permission-group/subject-permissions`

```
{
	"subjectPermission": "3FLQjBoNqTjx"
}
```

### Response - 200 OK:
```
{
    "message": "Subject Permissions in collection"
}
```

### Error Response Codes

`400 - Bad request`
```
{
    "message": "Required parameter "subjectPermission" missing",
    "code": 0
}
```

## Remove SubjectPermission from a collection

This route is idempotent and only confirms the status of the operation. For example it can be called multiple times with the same details and and will return the same response as long as the given SubjectPermission **does not** exists in the collection (regardles if it existed in the collection prior to the operation).

`DELETE /v1/permission-groups/:permission-group/subject-permissions/:subject-permission`

Segment Parameters:
* **subject-permission** (string), required - SubjectPermission id

### Request:
`DELETE /v1/permission-groups/:permission-group/subject-permissions/3FLQjBoNqTjx`

### Response - 200 OK:
```
{
    "message": "Subject Permissions not in collection"
}
```

### Error Response Codes

`404 - Not Found`
```
{
    "message": "PermissionGroup not found",
    "code": 0
}
```

Request a reset of the user password

Takes following body arguments:
 * userSpec - either User username or Email emailAddress

Example username:
This will request password reset for User with username admin
```
{
	"userSpec": "admin",
}
```
Example email:
This will request password reset for User with Email emailAddress admin@electivegroup.com
```
{
	"userSpec": "admin@electivegroup.com",
}
```

Response Example:
Status 202 OK - Password reset requested

Status 404 Not Found - User not found
```
{
    "message": "User not found",
    "code": 4040001
}
```

Status 429 Forbidden - Exceeded number of requests for this call
```
{
    "message": "API rate limit exceeded for this call",
    "code": 4000001
}
```

Status 404 Bad Request - The user exists, but has no valid and confirmed primary address defined
```
{
    "message": "No primary email has been defined for the user",
    "code": 4040021
```
```
}
```

## Authenticates user

`POST /v1/authenticate`

POST Parameters:
* **username** (string), required - Unique user name
* **password** (string), required - Password for this account
* **remember_me** (boolean), optional - Wheteher to extend validity of the token.
* **organisation** (string), optional - Namespace of the Organisation to log in to

### Request:
`POST /v1/authenticate`

```
{
	"username": "john.doe",
	"password": "123456",
	"remember_me": true,
	"organisation": "acme"
}
```

### Response - 200 OK:
```
{
    "token": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiJ9.eyJpYXQiOjE1NTY2OTg5MTAsInVzZXJuYW1lIjoiam9obi5kb2UiLCJleHAiOjE1NTY3ODUzMTB9.Qp0faG-Fu-96PCIrF7reZ-HSKiiMRq4wZDFqtVJKeYS8UZtFYjMzj2AHa1ht_Xbxz2y6jYvLp2GmIhv1uhXH7zDLT-S13-sOOHs4tCxWfkAPUtzhEF-bCv6DhfuW95Pa90cJLLy2sU7NxohCnczQ2zR_LhkeDwxz08DxRUpZ-UwC-gHzNpOFn1gvSyzlz-omL47Jig5LzLwB3kn4kO08bgJatcfgn1jnV21JoI6sqPHQshG0TwSo0Nx63nqhtb1D95Ytnwg1fxitfLkdzRq1d7Ky2qefuHjjNooUuJ9T60qB1gyi9GJqJCefh7ftJTCcoksQhjpJHLiT8ad_szegyQ"
}
```

### Error Response Codes

`400 - Bad request`
```
{
    "message": "Required parameter "usename" missing",
    "code": 0
}
```

`401 - Unauthorized`
```
{
    "message": "Invalid Credentials",
    "code": 4010001
}
```
```
{
    "message": "Invalid Credentials",
    "code": 401180002
}
```
```
{
    "message": "Invalid Credentials",
    "code": 401180003
}
```
`500 - Internal Server`
```
{
    "message": "Could not generate token",
    "code": 500090101
}
```

## Checks authorisation. Checks whether given *User* has *Permission* (can peroform action) on a *Subject* within given *Organisation*

`POST /v1/authorise`

POST Parameters:
* **permission** (string), required - Permission to evaluate
* **subject** (string), required - Subject to perform action on
* **organisation** (string), required - Namespace of the Organisation within which action will happen

Options not yet available:
* **username** (string), optional - Username of the user system will perform check for. By default check is done on User Token used for authentication. This option requires additional privilages.

### Request:
`POST /v1/authorise`

```
{
	"permission": "create",
	"subject": "USER",
	"organisation": "acme"
}
```

### Response - 200 OK:
```
{
    "message": "Authorised"
}
```

### Response - 403 Forbidden:
```
{
    "message": "Access denied",
    "code": 403180001
}
```

item.description:
## Error Codes:
There are two types of codes: Generic **4010001** (7 digits) and Specific **500090101** (9 digits) with following patterns: SSSEECC and SSSPPEECC respectivelly.
**SSS** - This is HTTP equivalent, i.e. 401, 404, 500
**PP** - Denotes project id, 18 for ACL API
**EE** - Denotes entity id
**CC** - Denotes unique error code for this entity

### List of codes:
**4010001** - "Invalid Credentials" - Unauthorized. Supplied credentials, such as username or password are invalid.
**400180901** - "Required parameter "email" missing" - Bad Request.
**400180902** - "Field email failed validation because value must be a valid E-Mail address" - Bad Request.
**400180903** - "Email not confirmed" - Bad Request.
**400180904** - "Email could not be verified. Token is either invalid or expired " - Bad Request.
**400181001** - "Required parameter "user" missing" - Bad Request.
**400181002** - "Required parameter "organisation" missing" - Bad Request.
**400181003** - "Required parameter "role" missing" - Bad Request.
**400181101** - "Required parameter "permission" missing" - Bad Request.
**400181102** - "Required parameter "subject" missing" - Bad Request.
**400181103** - "Required parameter "organisation" missing" - Bad Request.
**401180002** - "Invalid Credentials" - Unauthorized. User account is inactive.
**401180003** - "Invalid Credentials" - Unauthorized. User does not belong to the organisation.
**404180101** - "Organisation not found" - Not Found
**404180201** - "Permission not found" - Not Found
**404180301** - "PermissionGroup not found" - Not Found
**404180501** - "Role not found" - Not Found
**404180601** - "Subject not found" - Not Found
**404180701** - "SubjectPermission not found" - Not Found
**404180801** - "User not found" - Not Found
**404180901** - "Email not foud" - Not Found
**409180901** - "Email address jane.doe@example.com for user with username john.doe already exists" - Conflict.
**4000101** - "value for index 0, part 2 (field) must be one of (organisation.id, organisation.name, organisation.createdAt)
**4090001** - "Organisation with namespace acme already exists!

**400180801** - "value is too short. Minimum length is 8 characters
**400180802** - "value must include at least one number
**400180803** - "value must include at least two letter
**400180804** - "value must include at least one upper case character
**400180805** - "value must include at least one lower case character
**400180806** - "value must include at least one the special characters: . , ! @  $ % ^ & * ( ) _ - + = ? / \
